features.desc: The Fang can climb and walk on vertical surfaces. Mark a Stress to move from one shadow to another within Far range.

features.name: Pick Off the Straggler - Action
features.desc: Mark a Stress to cause a target within Melee range to make an Instinct Reaction Roll. On a failure, the target must mark 2 Stress and is teleported with the Fang to a shadow within Far range, making them temporarily Vulnerable. On a success, the target must mark a Stress.
